name: Super - Tiler™
description: Super - Tiler™ is a Premium latex additive for enhancing thinset mortars A latex additive for enhancing Portland cement thinset mortars for interior or exterior installation of ceramic, porcelain, quarry, marble, pavers and other natural stone tiles on floors and walls. Super-Tiler can be diluted 50% with water to be used as a latex additive for grout. Increases Bond Strength and Flexibility, Interior & Exterior Use, Allows Thinsets to be Used Over Plywood Subfloors, Provides Thermal Shock Resistance to Freeze-Thaw Cycling, Exceeds ANSI A118.4.
